item.title: Effective digital strategy starts with a clear understanding of business needs before the first line...
item.description: Effective digital strategy starts with a clear understanding of business needs before the first line of code is ever considered. Today, Finda Cloud and HAND Global Solutions co-hosted an executive luncheon in Singapore to discuss this exact principle. It was a pleasure to connect with regional leaders to explore the shifting demands of the modern enterprise. Our discussion highlighted how Freshworks is helping organizations bridge the gap between complex operations and seamless user experiences. By prioritizing intuitive design and agility, Freshworks enables businesses to: * Modernize legacy workflows without the typical complexity. * Scale service delivery at the pace of business growth. * Deliver measurable value to both employees and customers. Thank you to the team at HAND Global Solutions for your partnership, and to our guests for the insightful dialogue. Finally, our thanks to Freshworks for your continued trust and support. hashtag #FindaCloud hashtag #HandGlobal hashtag #Freshworks hashtag #APACDistributor hashtag #DigitalTransformation hashtag #ITSM hashtag #ITAM hashtag #CMDB hashtag #device42 Victor Leung Kelvin Cheung Lorraiine Lee Keith Liew Gary Yeo Kaushik Sekar

item.title: Happy New Year from Finda Cloud! As we step into 2026, we‚Äôre excited to introduce a new face for th...
item.description:
Happy New Year from Finda Cloud! As we step into 2026, we‚Äôre excited to introduce a new face for the journey ahead: the Finda Buddy. Inspired by the cloud in our company logo, we created this little one to bring a human touch to the "invisible" world of cloud software, turning abstract technology into something friendly and approachable. Whether he‚Äôs serving as your go-to companion for solving complex challenges or acting as a physical reminder that powerful software should be lightweight and stress-free, the Finda Buddy is here to scale alongside you this year. Thank you for being part of our story, we can‚Äôt wait to reach new heights together in 2026!

item.description: Strengthening the APAC Cloud Ecosystem for 2026 üåè‚òÅÔ∏è At Finda Cloud, we believe that strong technology is built on even stronger relationships. As we wrap up a dynamic 2025, our VP - Asia, Victor Leung and Regional Business Development Director, Kelvin Cheung, has been on the ground visiting our key vendor partners across Singapore, Malaysia, and Taiwan. These face-to-face sessions are vital. They allow us to align on roadmaps, understand local market nuances, and ensure our distribution strategy is ready for the next wave of cloud innovation. The feedback from our partners has been clear: the region is ready for growth. We are bringing back exciting new strategies to support our channel network. The foundation is set. item.title: We're excited to announce Finda Cloud Technology is the official APAC distributor for Prosfinity's A...
item.description: We're excited to announce Finda Cloud Technology is the official APAC distributor for Prosfinity's AIShieldNet! Traditional EDR solutions rely on signatures, leaving a gap for zero-day attacks. AIShieldNet closes this gap. It's the first AI Zero Day Response (ZDR) solution that uses advanced AI (LLMs) to set a new standard in endpoint security. Why AIShieldNet? - Real-Time Zero-Day Detection: Analyzes 100% of processes without signatures to stop fileless malware and novel attacks. - Stops Alert Fatigue: The AI filters noise and provides clear, natural-language explanations, letting your team focus on real threats. - Catches What EDR Misses: Understands behavior and intent, not just patterns. Finda Cloud is proud to bring this next-gen AI-driven cybersecurity to the APAC region. Contact us to learn how to secure your organization against modern threats! https://prosfinity.com/ hashtag #FindaCloud hashtag #Prosfinity hashtag #AIShieldNet hashtag #Cybersecurity hashtag #AI hashtag #ZDR hashtag #EDR hashtag #APAC hashtag #Partnership hashtag #ZeroDayAttack

item.description: üéâ Webinar Recap: Turning Feedback into Growth! üéâ We just wrapped up an insightful session of our SurveySparrow webinar, hosted in collaboration with Finda Cloud Technology! A big thank you to everyone who joined us on September 4-5, 2025, and contributed to the engaging discussions. ‚ú® Key Takeaways: Journey Mapping: Identified key customer touchpoints for enhanced experiences. item.description: Finda Cloud Technology is thrilled to announce our new partnership with We+ Asia, a leader in IT and digital solutions. We are excited to welcome them to them ever-expanding ecosystem of resellers. We+ brings a wealth of expertise in digital transformation, application development, and IT infrastructure. Their commitment to excellence and a proactive, strategic approach to client services perfectly aligns with our own values. This partnership will undoubtedly bring significant value to our customers. By combining We+'s consulting prowess with our robust portfolio of solutions, including Freshworks and Device42, A Freshworks Company, we are poised to create powerful, comprehensive offerings that will drive innovation and efficiency for businesses. We are confident that this collaboration will unlock new opportunities and generate immense value for our mutual clients. Join us in extending a warm welcome to the We+ team! We are excited to embark on this journey together and look forward to a future of shared success. As the application of artificial intelligence (AI) becomes increasingly widespread, many employees are uploading documents and utilizing systems for data analysis and integration. This naturally raises questions about the risk of data leakage.

item.description: üåü Thank You for a Successful Finda Cloud Technology Solution Day! üåü Last Friday, we had the pleasure of hosting our Finda Cloud Solution Day at the Sheraton Hong Kong Hotel & Towers. The event was a fantastic opportunity for professionals across the industry to come together and explore the latest advancements in cloud technology. üè®‚ú® We would like to extend our heartfelt gratitude to all the sponsors, Freshworks, TeamViewer, Tencent Cloud, Vimeo, KYOCERA Document Solutions Hong Kong Limited, SurveySparrow, Graylog, Inc., PCCW GLOBAL Limited Console Connect , HAND Global Solutions, who set up booths and showcased their innovative solutions. Your engaging product introductions provided invaluable insights and sparked inspiring conversations among attendees. It‚Äôs your expertise and dedication that drive our industry forward! To all participants, thank you for your enthusiasm and active engagement. Your presence made the event truly special, and we hope you left with new knowledge, connections, and ideas to implement in your organizations. Events like these remind us of the power of collaboration and community. We are excited about the partnerships forged and the collective growth that lies ahead as we navigate this ever-evolving landscape together. We look forward to more opportunities to connect, learn, and innovate. Stay tuned for upcoming events and initiatives from Finda Cloud Technology! item.description: üåü Thank You Freshworks for an Unforgettable Evening! üåü "Just one drink. Ok?" ‚Äî that's how legendary stories begin, and what a story we created at the annual Freshworks Soiree Evening! A heartfelt thank you to Freshworks for inviting Finda Cloud Technology to this wonderful gathering at the Quaich Bar, InterContinental Singapore. It was a night filled with camaraderie, insightful conversations, and the promise of collaboration. As the APAC distributer of Freshworks, we were thrilled to connect with so many incredible C-Suite leaders who shared their thoughts on the power of open communication and the transformative impact of AI in our work lives, contributing to an evening of shared insights and friendships. It was truly a night to remember. Looking forward to the next Soiree and continuing our journey together!ü•Ç Interested in accelerating your digital transformation? üöÄ üëâ Contact Finda Cloud Technology to explore how Freshworks can elevate your ITSM experience! item.description: Looking for a smarter, more cost-effective alternative to traditional CAPTCHA systems? We bring you a cutting-edge CAPTCHA solution designed for robust security and seamless integration. Powered by advanced technologies, this solution delivers comprehensive human verification with intuitive slider CAPTCHAs, utilizing track analysis, feature discovery, anti-emulator defenses, device fingerprinting, and PoW verification.
